author: maxb
msg: Shake copious amounts of dust out of ra-local-test, and re-enable it.
* build.conf (ra-local-test): Fix description, dependencies, and no longer skip.

author: fitz
msg: Incorporate review from Philip Martin.  Use svn_io_* instead of apr_*
* lock.c (make_dir): Unconditionally clear err if we get to the bottom
and svn_path_join_many instead of our own merge_paths, which used
instead of apr_stat.  Improve error checking.

author: fitz
msg: * lock.c (make_dir): Unconditionally clear err if we get to the bottom

author: fitz
msg: Incorporate changes from Peter Lundblad's review.

author: maxb
msg: Tidy up the tests section of build.conf.
* build.conf: Move comments about tests to description attributes.
Group tests by library they test, and add block divider comments.
